narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Bienville Holdings, Ltd is a Home Health provider based in Tyler, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $75.9M in Medicaid payments across 1.5M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $75.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
